title: Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
description: The software currently does not show the group dialog when the dataset is not defined. This is causing an issue where users are unable to define a group if the dataset is not set.
OB: The group dialog is not displayed when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. Users should have the ability to define a group, even if the dataset has not been defined.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Add a table report item to the project, but do not set the dataset.
3. Attempt to create a new table group.
